description: Overview of the RootPermissionOnlyError method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/smart-accounts/classes/RootPermissionOnlyError/constructor
---

Constructor for initializing an error message indicating that the root permission cannot be combined with other permissions.

<Note>
  `RootPermissionOnlyError` extends `PermissionBuilderError`, see the docs for
  PermissionBuilderError for all supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { RootPermissionOnlyError } from "@alchemy/smart-accounts";
```

## Parameters

### permission

`Permission`
The permission trying to be added atop the root permission
